## Installation:
```
$ npm i @or-sdk/bots
```

## Usage:
```typescript
import { Bots } from '@or-sdk/bots'

// with direct api url
const bots = new Bots({
  token: 'my-account-token-string',
  dataHubSvcUrl: 'http://example.data-hub-svc/endpoint'
});

// with service discovery(slower)
const bots = new Bots({
  token: 'my-account-token-string',
  discoveryUrl: 'http://example.bots/endpoint'
});
 ```
